recent_facts: Artie was killed by a malfunctioning vending machine.
The System has flagged Artie as a 'Unique Build' due to a 100% Crit Rate glitch.

last_scene: Artie Penhaligon, an exhausted office worker, attempted to buy chips from a vending machine using his last dollar.
After the machine stole his money and ignored his attacks, Artie kicked it, triggering a fatal electrical surge.
As Artie died, the System initialized, revealing a 'Crit-Only' glitch and beginning a recalculation of his data.
chapter_so_far: Artie Penhaligon dies in a mundane breakroom accident and enters the System.
key_facts_ring: Artie fails a Charisma check against a Model 4000 Snack-Master vending machine.
The vending machine consumes the crumpled dollar bill without providing credit.
Artie discovers the 'Glitched: Crit-Only' status effect while attempting to punch the machine.
Artie is electrocuted by a frayed power cord after kicking the machine's base.
Artie's HP reaches 0, triggering a 'Unique Build' detection by the System.
Artie drops his cracked smartphone and leather wallet as he collapses.
The world dissolves into a loading screen as Artie's character data is recalculated.
